p: The plant materials (fruits) of Datura metel were obtained from the hilly area of Razagram Toormang Dara, Dist; Dir, KPK, Pakistan. The plant sample was identified by Dr. Muhammad Ilyas, Head Department of Botany, University of Swabi, KPK, Pakistan. The voucher specimen no. Bot (UOS-521) was placed in the herbarium of the Botany Department of University of Swabi.
